casebody.data:
ARROYO
v.
ZAMORA 301P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Chad T. Diamond, Attorney at Law, for Zamora, Daniel J. Valerie Arroyo, for Arroyo, Valerie

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of November 2017 by Plaintiff for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
